Script: 日本語が分からない
Meaning: I don't understand Japanese

Script: 日本食は食べないです
Meaning: I don't eat Japanese food

Script: お金がないです
Meaning: I have no money

Script: 宿題をしないで学校に出かけてしまいました
Meaning: I left for school without doing my homework

Script: ここでタバコを吸わないでください
Meaning: Please don't smoke in here

Script: 英語がわらなかった
Meaning: I didn't understand English

Script: お友達は昨日来なかったです
Meaning: Your friend didn't show up yesterday

Script: お金がなかったです
Meaning: I didn't have any money

Script: 行かなかったらお母さんは怒るでしょう
Meaning: Your mother will be very angry if you don't go

Script: お金がなかったら困ると思います
Meaning: I think I'd be in trouble if I didn't have the money

Script: 聞かなければ分かりません
Meaning: You won’t know if you don’t ask

Script: お友達が来なければ電話をしてください
Meaning: If your friend doesn't show up, give us a call

Script: お金がなければ困ります
Meaning: If you don't have money, you're in trouble

Concept: without doing, not doing (te-form of nai)
I have/had someone to let me do (causative form)
I  got let/made do it (causative-passive form)

Script: 彼の話はちっち信じられません
Meaning: I don't believe a word he's saying

Script: 小説の初めは一番大切です
Meaning: The beginning of a novel is the most important

Script: お手紙を読み、すぐに返事を書きました
Meaning: I read your letter and wrote you back straight away

Script: 一時間ぐらい商店街を歩き回りました
Meaning: We walked around the shopping street for about an hour

Script: 三人はホテルのロビーで話し会いました
Meaning: The three of them met in the hotel lobby

Concept: do for someone, do upwards, finish doing (transitive)
way / method of doing, how to  (verb to noun)
normal polite present / future negative form
normal polite inclusive query, shall we …
appears to be about to, looks like

Script: おじさんは捨てるほどお金を持っています
Meaning: Uncle has money to throw away extensively
Concept: to the extent, so much that

Script: できるかぎり、努力します
Meaning: I will try to the extent that it is possible
Concept: to the extent that, in so far as, within the limits of

Script: 行くかわりに電話をしました
Meaning: I phoned instead of going
Concept: instead of, in place of, in exchange for

Script: テニスをする気があれば、一緒にしましょうか
Meaning: If you’re a mind to play tennis, shall we play together
Concept: be of a mind to, to have a mind to

Script: 今日病気で、仕事をする気がしません
Meaning: Today I am sick and don’t feel like working
Concept: feel like doing, willing to do

Script: 少しあるきまわると勉強する気になるでしょう
Meaning: If you walk around a little, you may come to feel like studying

Script: 時々を寿司を食べることがあります
Meaning: I eat sushi from time to time

Script: お兄さんはギータを引くことができる
Meaning: Older brother can play the guitar
Concept: be able to do, can do

Script: 土曜日にも働くことになりました
Meaning: It turns out that I will be working on Saturday, also

Script: お母さんが病気で病院に行くようになりました
Meaning: Mother was sick, so I wound up going to the hospital
Concept: reach to a point, to get to a point

Script: 明日東京にい行くことにしました
Meaning: I decided to go to Tokyo tomorrow

Script: やはり社長さんと話すようにしました
Meaning: He decided to speak with the company president after all

Script: 新しいのを買うまで、これを使って下さい
Meaning: Please use this until I buy a  new one

Script: お客さんが来るまでに、できあがると思います
Meaning: I think it will be finished by the time the guests come

Script: 帰る前におお店によって下さい
Meaning: Please go by the store before coming home

Script: 食べるものはありませんか
Meaning: Don’t you have anything to eat

Script: 忘れるな
Meaning: Don't forget

Script: 子供がわかるためにはっきりと説明して下さい
Meaning: In order for the children to understand, please explain clearly
Concept: in order to, so that, for the sake of, because of

Script: 東京によると友達にわあなくてはなりません
Meaning: If you stop by Tokyo, you must see my friend

Script: 今会社へ行く途中です
Meaning: I en route to the company now
Concept: be en route, on the way

Script: 今ちょっと出かけるところです
Meaning: We are about to go out now

Script: 車を買うとしたら、どんなものがいいかしら
Meaning: If we were to buy a car, what kind would be best

Script: お友達が来るとすれば、五月でしょう
Meaning: If your friend does come, It will probably be in May

Script: もしハワイいに止まるとすると一晩だけでしょう
Meaning: If we do stop in Hawaii, I will probably be only one night

Script: お母さんに聞くとしても、お父さんが賛成しないと思います
Meaning: Even if we ask Mother, I think Father will not approve

Script: 明日電車で行くつもりです
Meaning: I intend  to go by train tomorrow

Script: 明日出かけられるように準備しています
Meaning: I am preparing to be able to depart tomorrow

Script: 明日テニスをする予定です
Meaning: I plan to play tennis tomorrow

Concept: should have done, wish to do
should have done, wish to do (kuru: kureba, suru: sureba)
should have done, wish to do (kuru: kureba, suru: sureba)
